H0.text: Electrical to light is the energy transformation that occurs when a person hits a drum with a drumstick.

H1.text: Sound to electrical is the energy transformation that occurs when a person hits a drum with a drumstick.

H2.text: Light energy is transformed into mechanical energy when a person hits a drum with a drumstick.

H3.text: Mechanical to sound is the energy transformation that occurs when a person hits a drum with a drumstick.

A4.text: Sound is propagated by progressive longitudinal vibratory disturbances (sound waves).

A5.text: The sound source creates vibrations in the surrounding medium.
